basics.name: Gerric Abe
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a Double Major in the B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences and Japanese in the Department of East Asian Languages at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2028.

work.summary: Led a team of employees to ensure smooth operations and exceptional customer service during shifts.
highlights: Managed inventory, cash handling, and resolved customer issues efficiently.

awards.title: Atsuhiko Tateuchi Memorial Foundation Scholarship
awards.summary: Granted to students who are residents of the Pacific Rim states (Alaska, California, Hawaii, Oregon, and Washington) who demonstrate hard work, dedication, sincerity, and outstanding academic ability.

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: Maintained a GPA of 3.91 throughout the course of current college career.
